resources.string: It\'s Spider-Man and the FF from cover to cover as the Wall-Crawler and the Fantastic Four get their very own magazine! More stories of the world\'s greatest superheroes plus tons of extras that will knock your socks off!
SPIDER-MAN FEATURING THE SILVER SURFER MAGAZINE WAL-MART VARIANT (2007) #1
